Class AccelerometerManager

extends java.lang.Object
    Android Accelerometer Sensor Manager Archetype
    Author:
    antoine vianey under GPL v3 : http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html

      • isListening

        public static boolean isListening()
        Returns true if the manager is listening to orientation changes

      • stopListening

        public static void stopListening()
        Unregisters listeners

      • isSupported

        public static boolean isSupported()
        Returns true if at least one Accelerometer sensor is available

      • configure

        public static void configure(int threshold,
             int interval)
        Configure the listener for shaking
        Parameters:
        threshold - minimum acceleration variation for considering shaking
        interval - minimum interval between to shake events

      • startListening

        public static void startListening(AccelerometerListener accelerometerListener)
        Registers a listener and start listening
        Parameters:
        accelerometerListener - callback for accelerometer events

      • startListening

        public static void startListening(AccelerometerListener accelerometerListener,
                  int threshold,
                  int interval)
        Configures threshold and interval And registers a listener and start listening
        Parameters:
        accelerometerListener - callback for accelerometer events
        threshold - minimum acceleration variation for considering shaking
        interval - minimum interval between to shake events
